thread.title: UEFA backs Infantino as FIFA presidential candidate
thread.title_full: UEFA backs Infantino as FIFA presidential candidate

title: UEFA backs Infantino as FIFA presidential candidate
text:
UEFA backs Infantino as FIFA presidential candidate UEFA General Secretary Gianni Infantino in Nyon, Switzerland, October 15, 2015. Reuters/Denis Balibouse - 
UEFA's executive committee have thrown their full weight behind general secretary Gianni Infantino as a candidate for president of FIFA, European footballâ€™s governing body said on Monday. 
Swiss Infantino, who has been general secretary since 2009, was given unanimous backing by the executive committee, the organisation said in a statement.
